name: Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip: Target Limited Edition
overview: Shaun White Snowboarding: Road Trip takes the action-sports genre to a whole new level. For the first-time ever, feel the rocky weight of the mountain push up against your toes in your very own living room, ­with the revolutionary Wii Balance Board. Whether you’re coasting down bunny slopes or carving through black diamonds, don’t expect to survive this wild ride alone – you will need the support of an entourage and friends to make it down this mountain. Developed in close collaboration with Olympic Gold Medalist Shaun White – the most successful snowboarder in the history of the sport – Shaun White Snowboarding is set to redefine the action-sports genre. Target Limited Edition includes exclusive mountain, extra challenges and more!
